code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant TG as Telegram
    participant Web as Webhook Server (Education_ClassroomService)
    participant App as UseCase: EvaluateMsg
    participant LLM as LLM Client
    participant MCP as MCP Client

    TG->>Web: POST /webhook (Education_ContentCDN)
    Web->>App: HandleUpdate(Education_LMS_Portal)
    App->>App: Gate (Education_LMS_Portal)
    App->>App: RateLimit & Moderation check
    alt Engine = LLM
        App->>LLM: Analyze(Education_StudentDB)
        LLM-->>App: summary/eval
    else Engine = MCP
        App->>MCP: call tools (Education_LMS_Portal)
        MCP-->>App: tool results
    else Engine = Hybrid
        App->>MCP: context snippets
        MCP-->>App: evidence
        App->>LLM: Synthesize(Education_GradeSync)
        LLM-->>App: final answer
    end
    App-->>Web: reply text
    Web-->>TG: sendMessage

dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。
